ai-tha-ap556:1.2_0: I am surrounded by a brahmin,
ai-tha-ap556:2.1_0: Tissā, have come out of the Thirty-Three,
ai-tha-ap556:2.2_0: I’ve gained the best of men.
ai-tha-ap556:4.1_0: But in this life it may be used
ai-tha-ap556:4.2_0: to see the word of the Buddha.
ai-tha-ap556:4.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
ai-tha-ap556:5.1_0: My defilements have been burnt away by practicing absorption—
ai-tha-ap556:7.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
ai-tha-ap556:8.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Kimbila.
